rules: Your task is to locate a specific place on the map.
When you start, you will receive an image and a short text as a first hint. Tip: Look a little closer by clicking on the image.
Then you'll have 5 minutes to find the location.
You have 3 guesses for free, but you can purchase 2 more additionally.
You can also get two more hints to help you.
By clicking on your previous hint, you can purchase a compass to get the right direction. Use wisely!
Oh, and 'finding' the location means getting within a radius of about 50 km, so there's no need to be overly precise.
